field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #FROM_NAME# - Name of the sender #FROM_USER_ID# - ID of the sender #FROM_EMAIL# - E-Mail of the sender #TO_NAME# - Name of recipient #TO_USER_ID# - ID of recipient #TO_EMAIL# - E-Mail of recipient #SUBJECT# - Topic #MESSAGE# - Message #MESSAGE_DATE# - Date #MESSAGE_LINK# - Link to message
